title: Liquidation Business 101 - Introduction
headline: Learn about the scalable business of liquidation pallets and how to make it profitable in this free online course.
description: Liquidation pallets are a popular way to obtain merchandise from large retailers at a low cost so you can make money by reselling items through eCommerce. Ensure you have a good return on investment (ROI) by learning how to list products on multiple platforms such as Poshmark, eBay and Mercari. Then begin earning money from home with a computer connected to the internet. Start careful planning and researching to make ‘pallet flipping’ profitable.

courseDescription:
Are you curious about Amazon's liquidation business model? Or are you an entrepreneur looking for a scalable business in which to invest? Online liquidation allows you to obtain a pallet of returned or new merchandise. These pallets of unused items would pile up in warehouses if not liquidated. Lately, this has become a popular method to make money by reselling items that people return to retail stores. Although making a profit on these commodities is not always easy, one of the benefits is the possibility of running a business from home if you have an internet-connected computer. If you would like to start online reselling, this course introduces you to the foundations of this business model. If you have no prior experience, begin your venture by ‘pallet flipping’, which is buying a pallet and then selling the individual products for a profit.

Pallet flipping can only be profitable if the items are sold for a profit, utilising several platforms like Poshmark, eBay or Mercari. As a result, you can see a return on your investment with careful planning and research. The first module includes essential guidelines and digital tools to ensure you make good purchasing decisions based on critical data, such as daily sales, Amazon sellers ranking and retail price. Pallet buying and selling is not a 'get-rich-quick' framework, but you can begin to generate income in your own time. According to the experts, a great pallet will have an return on investment (ROI) of between 100–250 per cent profit. Maximising your revenue as a business person is essential so we have included a short section on monetary tactics like coupons and cashback to help you make extra money from your investments. Remember that liquidation pallets are a grouping of products that a store will sell at a discounted price because the item is no longer viable. Bryan Guerra, your tutor, will go over how you can start and grow a business selling these items. Learn how and where you can get these products and the requirements to obtain a reseller's permission to apply to specific marketplaces.

One of the most significant advantages is starting with a small investment. Another benefit is its scalability because you can start selling locally and ultimately reach a much larger audience by selling items across the country or even internationally. Additionally, the eCommerce world is becoming more expansive and sellers have more platforms to increase the worth of those liquidation pallets. Next, you will analyse and distinguish profitable investments with brand-name goods. You will also gain scavenging skills to select great products from liquidation sites like ‘BULQ.com’ or ‘888 Lots’. Finally, you will create your product listings from scratch by examining several examples, from purchasing and online marketing to generating profit. This course aims to help you in starting your own business. This type of business has numerous benefits, including the ability to work from home. This venture could be a gold mine. And remember: you can run it from anywhere. What is stopping you? Enrol now!

Start Course Now

Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:

Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This module will explain the scalable model of liquidation pallets by providing you with a basic knowledge of the business operations. Learn how to manage cashback websites and credit cards, which will increase the Return on Investment (ROI) on your sales. Additionally, get guidance for evolving into a prosperous online seller.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This module provides you with the essentials to assess the merchandise's profitability on liquidation websites, such as 888lots.com, by bargaining offers. Also, learn to create a product listing on eCommerce sites like Poshmark and Mercari. Besides, start analysing a liquidation lot to understand the item cost, shipping prices, and product worth.

  • Lesson Summary

    • A liquidation company obtains extremely low-cost brand-name high-end products from retailers such as Walmart, Target, and Best Buy.
    • The Jungle Scout chrome extension will provide you with the best indicator of that product's sales velocity, allowing you to make informed decisions on how many potential units to purchase.
    • The AMZ Scout online seller add-on shows all the sellers on a specific product with the respective prices, regardless of whether they're FBA or merchant.
    • This Amazon Prime membership will not only save money, but it will save you time.
  • The Cashback Business Tactic
    • A cashback credit card, such as the Amazon Prime Store Card, which offers 5% cashback on all Amazon purchases, is essential.
    • The Discovery credit card gives you the same 5% cashback on various websites such as Amazon, Walmart, or Target, where you're already going to shop.
    • Rakuten is an online retailer where you can earn cashback on your purchases.

  • Lesson Summary

  • Tips and Tricks to Scale on the Business
    • Get organised and decide whether to buy in bulk as an investment in a legitimate business or liquidation.
    • Use multi-channel listing software to assist you in locating liquidation on sites that have product identifiers.
    • When you sell a product, you should use an inventory system to remove it from the various published platforms.
    • Scanning software is highly recommended if you intend to scale up your online arbitrage to any extent.
    • A site like 888lots.com can help you verify all the products and morph those precise listings and images over to wherever you want them to be, or merely list them back on Amazon.
    • If your Amazon listing isn't selling, consider sending it to eBay, Mercari, or Poshmark.
